MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA26 postcode area of Ballantrae. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.15am to carry out repairs to an overhead pole near to Finnarts Bay and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.30am on Monday 18th January 2021.
